129 contributorstranslationsсрпскиportuguêsالعربيةparty in the usa lyricsverse 1

am i gonna fit in

everybody seems so famous

and a jayz song was on
and a jayz song was on
and a jayz song was on

chorus

theyre playin my song the butterflies fly away
im noddin my head like yeah
movin my hips like yeah

i know im gonna be okay
yeah its a party in the usa 
yeah its a party in the usa 
you might also likeverse 2

everybodys lookin at me now
like whos that chick thats rockin kicks

so hard with my girls not around me
its definitely not a nashville party
cause all i see are stilettos
i guess i never got the memo
